title: One Month FREE!! Restored One Bedroom Available Soon!!
posting_body: ['Quiet, Island Living', 'Located on Mercer Island just outside of Seattle, Washington you’ll find comfort and convenience in this luxury apartment community.', 'Shorewood offers restored, spacious one, two, and three bedroom apartment homes that feature hardwood floors, crown molding, washer and dryer in every home and fully equipped kitchens.', 'Residents can also enjoy our community room, 24-hour fitness center, tennis courts and basketball courts.', 'Mercer Island schools nearby and easy access to I-90 puts you in a great location where residents enjoy numerous shopping and dining venues nearby and around Seattle.', 'Lease today to experience luxury living at its best.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 83', 'OR Text', '83', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to contact our team.', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 671 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Granite Countertops*', '- Lush treehouse-style views*', '- Balcony*', '- Large picture windows', '- Neutral-toned carpeting in bedrooms*', '- Dishwasher', '- Carpeted and Hardwood Floors', '- Shaker-style white or soft grey cabinetry*', '- Spacious kitchens with charming garden windows', '- Luxe baths with oversized mirrors', '- Expansive walk-in closets*', '- Washer/dryer', '- Fireplace*', '- Stainless steel appliances*', '- Built-in microwaves', '- Views of Lake Washington*', '*In select units', 'Community Amenities', '- Fitness center', '- Shuffleboard', '- Bike storage', '- Private yoga room', '- Surrounded by nature', '- Three new playgrounds', '- Guest Suite', '- Online Payments Available', '- Expansive sun deck', '- Powered by Alfred (resident tech platform)', '- Indoor/outdoor demo kitchen with bar', '- Sports Pavilion Gazebo', '- Billiards', '- Grilling stations', '- Renovated clubhouse with flat-screen TVs, lounge, and Wi-Fi', '- Nearby walking trails', '- Fitness-on-Demand', 'Pet Policy', 'We are a pet friendly community!', 'We welcome both cats and dogs, with a maximum of two pets per household.', 'For dogs, we do also have breed restrictions of Pit Bull Terriers/Staffordshire Terriers, Rottweilers, Doberman Pinschers, Chows, Presa Canarios, Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, and Wolf-Hybrids, and a maximum weight limit of 75lbs.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday: 10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday: 11:00AM-5:00PM', 'Shorewood', '3209 Shorewood Drive, Mercer Island, WA, 98040', 'We do not accept Comprehensive Reusable Tenant Screening Reports as defined by and pursuant to RCW 59.18.', '5UHq63gQ']
